ygData.subject: Re: Enchant Silver spell rumor
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes it is in Neriak for sure as I ve bought it.  On the way to our necro guild before you get to the ghouls before you go through the wall and by the water
ygData.messageBody:
Yes it is in Neriak for sure as I've bought it. On the way to our necro
guild before you get to the ghouls before you go through the wall and by
the water there is a building on your left which I think of as the
library. There are 3? merchants on the bottom and a couple on top. The
one in the center has the enchant metal spells. Cost me 4.5 plat.

Flarfian
level 9 necro

-----Original Message-----
From: DeGirolami, Franck [mailto:degirolami@...]
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 5:29 PM
To: Eqenchanters (E-mail)
Subject: [eqenchanters] Enchant Silver spell rumor


From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>

I've heard an ongoing rumor that the Enchant Silver spell was only sold
in
Neriak...well, I have a dark elf necro level 16 so I know Neriak pretty
well. I've been all over Neriak in all spellcasting guilds and all the
shops
I could think of that could be somewhat related...nothing..
Can somebody confirm / deny this rumor and tell me where to get the
spell in
Neriak?
Thanks,
Skara
